      • areEmpty

        public static boolean areEmpty​(java.lang.String... strings)
        Comprueba que todas las cadenas pasadas como parámetro son vacías. (es decir, con que haya una sóla cadena de las pasadas que sea NO vacía, este método devuelve false).
        Parameters:
        strings -
        Returns:
        true si todas las cadenas pasadas son vacías.

      • isMeaningless

        public static boolean isMeaningless​(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if passed String has meaning chars: only letters and digits count (tabs, spaces, CR, LF, punctuation, underscores, etc does not count).
        Parameters:
        s - String to check.
        Returns:
        True if passed string contains at least one letter or digit.

      • isLastChar

        public static boolean isLastChar​(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                                 char c)
        Checks if passed char is the last one in the passed StringBuilder.
        • If string is null, returns false
        • If string is empty, returns false
        • Else, returns true if last char of string == passed char
        Parameters:
        sb - StringBuilder to check
        c - Character to check
        Returns:
        true if passed char is the last one in the passed string.

      • isLastChar

        public static boolean isLastChar​(java.lang.String s,
                                 char c)
        Checks if passed char is the last one in the passed string.
        • If string is null, returns false
        • If string is empty, returns false
        • Else, returns true if last char of string == passed char
        Parameters:
        s - String to check
        c - Character to check
        Returns:
        true if passed char is the last one in the passed string.

      • contains

        public static boolean contains​(java.lang.Object o,
                               char... chars)
        Returns true if the string contains any of passed chars.

        Note: to check only 1 char, use String::indexOf(...)

        Parameters:
        o - Object (converted to String) to search into.
        chars - 2 or more chars to check (to check only 1 char, use String:indexOf(...))
        Returns:
        true if the string contains any of passed chars.

      • removeLast

        public static java.lang.String removeLast​(java.lang.String fromString,
                                          int nChars)
        Removes from the String the last N characters.
        If passed String is null, null is returned.
        If nChars is bigger than the length of the passed string, empty string ("") is returned.
        Parameters:
        fromString -
        nChars -
        Returns:
        The string resulting of removing last N chars.

        Parameters:

        nChars -
        Returns:
        Received StringBuilder.

        Returns:

      • replaceFirst

        public static java.lang.String replaceFirst​(java.lang.String where,
                                            java.lang.String find,
                                            java.lang.String replace)
        Replaces (ignoring case) first occurrence of 'find' in 'where' by 'replace'.
        Parameters:
        where - String to make the replacement.
        find - What to find in 'where'
        replace - The string to be used instead of 'find'.
        Returns:
        The 'where' after replacing.

      • replaceAll

        public static java.lang.String replaceAll​(java.lang.String sWhere,
                                          java.lang.String sOld,
                                          java.lang.String sNew)
        Makes a replaceAll, on whole words only, ignoring the case and not replacing inside double-quotes ("...").
        Parameters:
        sWhere - String where to make the replacements.
        sOld - What to remove.
        sNew - What to add.
        Returns:
        sWhere after replaced.

      • get1stMacro

        public static java.lang.String get1stMacro​(java.lang.String str)

      • startsWith

        public static boolean startsWith​(java.lang.StringBuilder where,
                                 java.lang.String what)
        Finds if a string starts with another string ignoring case.

        This method is faster than doing: 

            return where.trim().toLowerCase().startsWith( what.toLowerCase() );
        If any of arguments is null, returns false.
        Parameters:
        where - Where to search
        what - What to search
        Returns:
        true if where starts with what, false otherwise.

      • startsWith

        public static boolean startsWith​(java.lang.String where,
                                 java.lang.String what)
        Finds if a string starts with another string ignoring case.

        This method is faster than doing: 

            return where.trim().toLowerCase().startsWith( what.toLowerCase() );
        If any of arguments is null, returns false.
        Parameters:
        where - Where to search
        what - What to search
        Returns:
        true if where starts with what, false otherwise.

      • endsWith

        public static boolean endsWith​(java.lang.String str,
                               java.lang.String end)
        Returns true if 'str' ends with 'end' (the str is trimmed, but not the end) ignoring the case.

        This is faster than doing: str.toLowercase().endsWith( end.toLowercase() ), especially for long strings.

        Parameters:
        str -
        end -
        Returns:
        true if str ends with 'start' (the str is trimmed, but not the end) ignoring the case.

      • endsWith

        public static boolean endsWith​(java.lang.StringBuilder sb,
                               java.lang.String end)
        Returns true if 'sb' ends with 'end' ignoring the case.

        This is faster than doing: sb.toLowercase().endsWith( end.toLowercase() ), especially for long strings.

        Parameters:
        sb -
        end -
        Returns:
        true if 'sb' ends with 'end' ignoring the case.

        Returns:
        The creates String.

      • toString

        public static java.lang.String toString​(java.lang.Object o)
        If passed object is an instance of Throwable, its stack trace is returned, otherwise its string representation is returned (this is useful for Object::toString()). If passed object is null, then "null" is returned.
        Parameters:
        o -
        Returns:
        Either the stack trace or the string representation of passed object.

      • toStringBrief

        public static java.lang.String toStringBrief​(java.lang.Throwable th)
        Returns the message and the cause (if any) of received Throwable (no stack-trace).
        If passed object is null, then "" is returned.
        Parameters:
        th - To represent as string.
        Returns:
        The message and the cause (if any) of received Throwable.
